name: Zeno
description:
Zeno is an exploration of a certain philosopher's paradoxes, a meditation on hopelessness, and an entry for the Wish You Were Here Postcard Jam.

For the Carrying On diversifier, I used this public-domain 18th-century engraving from the collection of the Metropolitan Museum of Art to create the background.

If you actually play it yourself or with others, I'd love to hear about it and read the stories that result in the comments!

I did try to make the download something that could realistically be printed but not very hard and I don't own a printer so good luck y'all
